name: Myweatherapp
tagline: Android application for checking weather condition for 5 cities(currently).
body:
### MyWeatherApp
Android Application for finding weather conditions for 5 cities currently :-
1.) Jaipur
2.) Banglore
3.) Bikaner
4.) Delhi 
5.) Mumbai

The app uses the weather api :- "http://developers.forecast.io"
Technology used:- OkHttp,ButterKnife,JSON,Spinners.
